original_text: Another reason I wrote you was to see if you would stand the test and be obedient in everything.
korean_text: 너희가 범사에 순종하는지 그 증거를 알고자 하여 내가 이것을 너희에게 썼노라

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 쓴 또 다른 이유는

sentences.original_text: was to see if you would stand the test
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 시험을 견딜 수 있는지 보려는 것이었다
